aboutpara:
I'm the person who sits happily in the middleâ€”the sweet spot where design meets code. I don't just build beautiful interfaces; I build them right. I love the challenge of taking a creative vision and translating it into clean, high-performing code that makes users go, "Wow, that was easy!" Essentially, I'm a hybrid builder, fluent in both the aesthetic and the technical, ensuring every project is functional, efficient, and visually compelling.

Outside of coding, my life is powered by a couple of non-screen passions (mostly). I'm a massive hockey fan and love being around that high-energy, fast-paced atmosphere. When I need to really switch off, I'm diving deep into a new world with video games on my days off. Itâ€™s my perfect way to balance intense focus with a bit of escapism and fun.
